duties_responsibilities.duty: Works on multiple trials across multiple Therapeutic Areas.
Mentors and coaches junior flex team and acts as Lead SM-training other SMs on study.
Develops site start up documents for studies including SIV agenda.
Represents LTMs or SMs on SMTs/meetings.
Supports country budget development and/or contract negotiation in liaison with CCS colleagues.

education_certification.credential: B.S., R.N., or equivalent degree in Biological Sciences.
Minimum of 3 years’ experience in monitoring pharmaceutical industry clinical trials.
Knowledge of Good Clinical Practice, ICH guidelines, and local regulatory requirements.
Legally authorized to work in the United States.
